TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_pahabay, title = pahabay, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/pahabay} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam:養育；餵養) pahabay ci Pucu' tu tulakuk. Pucu'在養雞. mangelu' pahabay tu wawa. 養孩子很辛苦.
(kamo no holam:養育；餵養) pahabay ci Poco' to tolakok. Poco'在養雞. mangelo' pahabay to wawa. 養孩子很辛苦.
